{Item:{id:"minecraft:stone",Count:1b,Damage:0s}}你这样就已经整个NBT写完了...而你在后面....{Item:{id:"minecraft:stone",Count:1b,Damage:0s}},Passengers


也就是说你写成了： /summon Item ~ ~1 ~ {},Passengers
